tech_news.description: Early Black Friday deals are live with big discounts on PS5, Nintendo Switch/Switch 2 and Xbox games, hardware and accessories. Plus Walmart tech bargains, $25 Pokémon plushies and huge streaming service offers.

tech_news.title: Modder who first put Thomas the Tank Engine into Skyrim flips the bird at the lawyers, does it again in Morrowind: "I fundamentally do not view toy company CEOs or media CEOs as people" - GamesRadar+
